Name: Remedy Lore 3
Notes: Difficult to condense as the descriptions will overlap

Name: Pharmacology
Notes: Improves potency of recovery items like potions.

Name: Toxicology
Notes: Reverses the effects of recovery items when used.

Name: Geomancy
Notes: Weather effects have no effect on attacks.

Name: Saboteur
Notes: Bypass the enemy's vitality when casting magick.

Name: Spendthrift
Notes: Enables casting of magicks with gil, rather than MP.

Name: Safety
Notes: Protects from Instant Death, Warp, Bubble, and gravity damage.

Name: Ignore Evasion
Notes: Bypass the enemy's evasion when attacking.

Name: Alert
Notes: Increases evasion by 25 if evasion is greater than 0.

Name: Improved Counter
Notes: Counter attack at a more signficant rate.

Name: Trigger Happy
Notes: Improves chance to score multiple hits.

Name: Master Thief
Notes: Enables the theft of superior and rare items.

Name: Invisible
Notes: Invisible to enemies who detect sound and magick.

Name: Soulbind
Notes: Enemy receives 5% of damage dealt to user.
